SEARCH

Class CCMCampReportService

java.lang.Object
CCMCampReportService
public class CCMCampReportService extends Object
The CCMCampReportService class provides functionality to generate a report for a Camp Committee Member (CCM). It allows generating reports containing camp and attendee details based on specified filters.

  • Method Details

    • generateCampReport

      public void generateCampReport(Student campCommittee, CampList campList, String OutPath)
      Generates a camp report for a Camp Committee Member.
      Parameters:
      campCommittee - The Student representing the Camp Committee Member.
      campList - The CampList containing the camps.
      OutPath - The output path for the generated report.

    • getAlphabetFilter

      public String getAlphabetFilter()
      Retrieves an alphabet filter from user input.
      Returns:
      A single alphabet provided by the user.

    • getUserConfirmation

      public boolean getUserConfirmation()
      Retrieves user confirmation for yes/no input.
      Returns:
      true if user input is "yes" or "y", otherwise false.

    • createFilter

      public Filter createFilter()
      Creates a filter based on user-provided options.
      Returns:
      The generated Filter object based on user selections.

    • getUserInput

      public String getUserInput()
      Retrieves user input from the console.
      Returns:
      The user input as a String.
